card.name: Peaceful Prairie
card.text: {t}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {2}, {t}: Tap target blocking creature and target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by those creatures this turn.

card.name: Moonlit Lake
card.text: {t}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {1}, {t}: Each player may scry 1.

card.name: Murky Marshtide
card.text: {t}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {4}, {t}: Draw a card. Each card you exile from your graveyard while activating this ability pays for {1}.

card.name: Volatile Lava Pool
card.text: {t}: Add {R} to your mana pool. {1}, {t}: Deal 1 damage to target attacking creature.

card.name: Mysterious Temple
card.text: {t}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {3}, {t}: Tap target creature. That creature explores.

card.name: Comfy Snow Fort
card.text: {t}: Add {c} to your mana pool. {3}, {t}: Target nonattacking creature's toughness is doubled and gains defender until end of turn.

card.name: Darkspace
card.text:
Whenever another land enters your battlefield, exile Darkspace.
Whenever a basic land’s ability causes you to add one or more mana, add one additional mana that land can produce.
{t}: Add {c} to you mana pool.

card.name: Grand Casino
card.text:
Shroud
When Grand Casino enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped basic land you control to its owner's hand. Grand Casino enters with 2 luck counters.
{t}: Add {X} to your mana pool, where {X} is the number of luck counters on Grand Casino.
{t}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, add a luck counter to Grand Casino. If you lose the flip, halve the number of luck counters to Grand Casino, rounded down.

card.name: Bestial Woods
card.text: {t}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {G}{G}, {t}: You may cast nonhuman creature spells this turn as though they had flash.

card.name: Wonderland
card.text:
Whenever you discard the first card per turn, if it’s a spell, it gains madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost.
{t}: Add {c} to your mana pool.

card.name: <Name<
card.text: As <Name> enters the battlefield, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a land card. You may have <Name> enter as a copy of that card. Put all other exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.
